website_summaries.verdict: While not strictly a sleep blanket like other contenders on our shortlist, this is a well-regarded example of a multi-functional throw blanket. Its ultra-low price and strong thermal qualities make it a great bargain.
pros: Surprisingly good thermal qualities at its price point
Could be used as a throw or extra layer on cold nights
cons: Texture may not be as soft or plush as expected
Pilling after laundering is a common issue
Works better on bed than as travel blanket
